channel.title: How do I make an rsps
channel.description: I've been trying to create an RSPS, but most tutorials are outdated. Can someone take me through it step by step, thank you.

item.title: How do I make an rsps
item.dc:creator: @naseem142 naseem142
item.description:
@naseem142 wrote:

tyb97:

This is why we are dying. Not because servers are dying, not because Mopar is full of assholes. It’s sinisoul’s fault. Blame it all on sinisoul. It’s all his fault.

but seriously though listen to tyb those tutorials aren’t outdated at all. Even try to install any source and fiddle around a bit and try to learn some basic stuff.

Read full topic

item.title: How do I make an rsps
item.dc:creator: @iSarah iSarah
item.description:
@iSarah wrote:

[quote=“tyb97, post:2, topic:551212”][quote author=iSarah link=topic=670127.msg4481077#msg4481077 date=1429821268]
I’ve been trying to create an RSPS, but most tutorials are outdated.
[/quote]
Actually they aren’t.

https://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,342685.0.html

Yes, it’s old, however not outdated. All the same steps just newer software at the end of the links.

I also recommend familiarizing yourself with the Java programming language:
https://docs.oracle.com/javase/tutorial/reallybigindex.html

I don’t know what your current mindset is, but these private servers aren’t like those you’d find in source games or minecraft and what not, you actually have to know how to program to “create an RSPS”, which you really aren’t doing, you’ll start out by installing a base and then running it, hopefully making your changes and then hosting and all that good stuff. Pretty much the best tl;dr example I can give you.[/quote]

I forgot to mention, i’m using a mac, this makes it very confusing

Read full topic

item.title: How do I make an rsps
item.dc:creator: @tyb97 tyb97
item.description:
@tyb97 wrote:

iSarah:

I’ve been trying to create an RSPS, but most tutorials are outdated.

Actually they aren’t.

https://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,342685.0.html

Yes, it’s old, however not outdated. All the same steps just newer software at the end of the links.

I also recommend familiarizing yourself with the Java programming language: https://docs.oracle.com/javase/tutorial/reallybigindex.html

I don’t know what your current mindset is, but these private servers aren’t like those you’d find in source games or minecraft and what not, you actually have to know how to program to “create an RSPS”, which you really aren’t doing, you’ll start out by installing a base and then running it, hopefully making your changes and then hosting and all that good stuff. Pretty much the best tl;dr example I can give you.

Read full topic
